name: SOUTHBOUND
description:
Seeking all of the glory, an adventurer will be heading south――

"SOUTHBOUND" is an oldschool JRPG with the flavor of some classic JRPGs.

SNES games quarity graphics, detailed maps.

Old style texts and sense of playing, that will remind you of memories of NES RPGs.

The scenario is a little bit dark and serious, but not too dark.

Battle difficulty is not easy, but not too difficult.

Beautiful music and kinds of sound effects set the mood for battle and story.

There's no difficult game system to understand.

The playing time is 15 - 20 hours. it's not long, but I promise you a fruitful journey.

If you play this game, you feel like you are a child who plays games in front of TV.
